author: Dana Hedgpeth
title: Live updates: Virus death toll tops 1,000 in region; Hogan responds to Trump criticism over South Korean kits; spelling bee canceled - The Washington Post
description: Live updates: Virus death toll tops 1,000 in region; Hogan responds to Trump criticism over South Korean kits; spelling bee canceled  The Washington PostView Full Coverage on Google News
content:
Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) said Tuesday that he was doing what President Trump instructed states to do when he made the decision for Maryland to purchase 500,000 coronavirus tests from South Korea.
During an appearance on MSNBCs Morning Joe, Hogan said he… [+1621 chars]
